name: Plugin Name: CM Subscriber Stats
author: Dialect

sections.description:
This plugin pulls data from your Campaign Monitor lists’ feeds and displays them on your WordPress dashboard.

White labeling

CM Subscriber Stats was built with white-labelers in mind, and it’s possible to remove virtually all mention of Campaign Monitor so you can promote your own services.

See the CM Subscriber Stats project page for details.

Did you find this plugin useful?

You can write a “recommendation” for me on my LinkedIn profile.

Contact and Credits

Written by Alex Dunae (dialect.ca), e-mail ‘code’ at the same domain), 2009.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Get the feed URLs from your Campaign Monitor lists and enter them in the Campaign Monitor Subscriber Stats settings page.
  4. Optionally, set the Dashboard widget title in the Campaign Monitor Subscriber Stats settings page to re-brand the widget.

short_description: See your email list subscriber statistics on your WordPress dashboard.
